channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Maple tree adjacent to car parking area within Mottingham sports fieldsp, 9th August
item.description:
Maple tree with vigorous basal gowth.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Grove Park Road, Sundridge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned Blue Mercedes, 9th August
item.description:
Appears a blue Mercedes has been abandoned on Ascot Road since around 6pm on 8 August. It has its windows open and is parked badly on the curb and across a driveway. The MOT lapsed in January 2025 too. This is the second vehicle dumped on the road within metres of one another. The red car in the photo is the other one.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Ascot Road, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Yet more furniture and garden waste being dumped, 9th August
item.description:
Please drive down Cobourg Road - there are several pieces of furniture dumped on the pavement and are attracting other people to behave the same. Please remove asap. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cobourg Road, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing Buckingham Palace Road nameplate, 9th August
item.description:
The building mounted Buckingham Palace Road nameplate here is missing. Located at the junction with Eccleston Street, on the Joe and the Juice building.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Eccleston Street, Victoria, London

item.title: Pavement blocked, 9th August
item.description:
The hedge at 74 Mayplace Road East is protruding onto the road, it makes passing with a motorised scooter and buggy impossible. Have tried knocking but no answer. We have to go out in the road to get by and it's very dangerous as it is on a busy corner.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 74, Mayplace Road East, Barnehurst, Bexleyheath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
